channel.title: JA-SIG Portal Demos
channel.description: In an effort to showcase the flexibility of the JA-SIG Portal framework, participating universities are encouraged to host their portal implementation. Listed here is a directory of portal implementations from participating universities and partners. If your university is currently hosting an implementation of the JA-SIG portal, and it is not listed here, please send email to kweiner@interactivebusiness.com.

image.title: JA-SIG Portal
image.description: The JA-SIG Portal is a free, sharable portal for institutions of higher-education
